Description: Moulded pottery daily life shabti of Tjanefer, a priest of Amun with painted detail: a black curled lappet-wig and arms resting on the pleated triangular apron of the white tunic inscribed with black painted hieroglyphs on a yellow panel; the feet are differentiated and the toes are marked, the back is unmodelled.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
